Package dev.strwbry.eventhorizon.events.inventoryadjustments

Class ButterFingers

java.lang.Object
dev.strwbry.eventhorizon.events.BaseEvent
dev.strwbry.eventhorizon.events.inventoryadjustments.BaseInventoryAdjustment
dev.strwbry.eventhorizon.events.inventoryadjustments.ButterFingers
public class ButterFingers extends BaseInventoryAdjustment
Event that causes players to randomly drop items from their hands at random intervals. This negative event continuously checks players' hands and forces them to drop held items.

  • Field Summary

  • Constructor Details

    • ButterFingers

      public ButterFingers()
      Constructs a new ButterFingers event. Initializes the event as NEGATIVE classification with continuous operation enabled. Sets a random initial operation interval between 5 and 60 seconds.

  • Method Details

    • applyToPlayer

      protected boolean applyToPlayer(org.bukkit.entity.Player player)
      Applies the butter fingers effect to a specific player. Checks both main hand and off hand for items and forces the player to drop them.
      Specified by:
      applyToPlayer in class BaseInventoryAdjustment
      Parameters:
      player - the target player
      Returns:
      true if an item was dropped, false if both hands were empty

    • execute

      public void execute()
      Executes the ButterFingers event. Sets an initial random interval and starts the continuous operation.
      Overrides:
      execute in class BaseInventoryAdjustment

    • terminate

      public void terminate()
      Terminates the ButterFingers event. Stops the continuous operation task.
      Overrides:
      terminate in class BaseInventoryAdjustment
